name: Omega\_Operator\_Global\_Constraint
intent: Define Ω as the global constraint and meta-normalization operator governing all subordinate layers.

axiom\_box.name: Omega\_Principle
axiom\_box.intent: Ω enforces globally consistent admissible states across all operators.
constraints: Ω ∘ O \= O ∘ Ω for all lawful operators O

operators.Omega\_Flatten: Collapses local inconsistencies to global coherence

notes: Defines Ω at the highest level of abstraction.
